segments.text: Valerie ! Hi ! Wow how have you been ? It ’ s been such a long time !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Darlene ! Indeed , it ’ s been a while ! How have you been ? Wow , you look amazing ! I love what you ’ Ve done with your hair !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Thanks ! I went to that hair salon that you told me about , but enough about me ! Look at you ! You haven ’ t aged a day since the last time I saw you ! What is your secret !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ha ha , come on ! Well , I ’ Ve been watching what I eat , and working out three times a week . By the way , I heard your son recently graduated !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , my little Paul is finally a doctor . They grow up so fast you know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He is such a handsome guy . He gets his looks from his mother of course !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you ! What about your daughter , Pamela ? I heard she has passed the bar exam and married recently .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh yes . She had a beautiful wedding in Cozumel Mexico and we all attended .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Such a lovely girl . I hope my Paul is lucky enough to find a girl like that someday !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But of course ! Well , it ’ s been great talking to you , but I have to get going .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Same here ! We will catch up soon , maybe over coffee !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be great ! Give me a call !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: See you soon ! Bye ! Egg ... I can ’ t stand that woman or her obnoxious daughter .
segments.speaker: S1
